introduction.subtitle: Welcome to my
about.content: Hello, I'm Esteban - boss of Wavyzz, a consulting and IT services company, as well as retail. You are here on my personal portfolio which is no longer up to date or maintained, that doesn't prevent that if you have a project that is close to your heart, you can still contact me at esteban.thilliez@wavyzz.com. I will answer you as soon as possible !
contact.name: Name
contact.error: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again later.
contact.success: Message sent successfully! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
footer.thanks_text:
Thank you for visiting my website. I hope you enjoyed what you found here!

Feel free to send me a message for any inquiries.
madeby.2: by Esteban Thilliez. Designed with Figma. Powered by React. Hosted on Vercel. Source
